text: <a href="../1-Corinthians-9-1/" title="1 Corinthians 9:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Am I not an apostle? am I not free? have I not seen Jesus Christ our Lord? are not ye my work in the Lord?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-2/" title="1 Corinthians 9:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 If I be not an apostle unto others, yet doubtless I am to you: for the seal of mine apostleship are ye in the Lord.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-3/" title="1 Corinthians 9:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Mine answer to them that do examine me is this,
<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-4/" title="1 Corinthians 9:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 Have we not power to eat and to drink?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-5/" title="1 Corinthians 9:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Have we not power to lead about a sister, a wife, as well as other apostles, and *as* the brethren of the Lord, and Cephas?
<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-6/" title="1 Corinthians 9:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Or I only and Barnabas, have not we power to forbear working?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-7/" title="1 Corinthians 9:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 Who goeth a warfare any time at his own charges? who planteth a vineyard, and eateth not of the fruit thereof? or who feedeth a flock, and eateth not of the milk of the flock?
<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-8/" title="1 Corinthians 9:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 Say I these things as a man? or saith not the law the same also?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-9/" title="1 Corinthians 9:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 For it is written in the law of Moses, Thou shalt not muzzle the mouth of the ox that treadeth out the corn. Doth God take care for oxen?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-10/" title="1 Corinthians 9:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 Or saith he *it* altogether for our sakes? For our sakes, no doubt, *this* is written: that he that ploweth should plow in hope; and that he that thresheth in hope should be partaker of his hope.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-11/" title="1 Corinthians 9:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 If we have sown unto you spiritual things, *is it* a great thing if we shall reap your carnal things?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-12/" title="1 Corinthians 9:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 If others be partakers of *this* power over you, *are* not we rather? Nevertheless we have not used this power; but suffer all things, lest we should hinder the gospel of Christ.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-13/" title="1 Corinthians 9:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 Do ye not know that they which minister about holy things live *of the things* of the temple? and they which wait at the altar are partakers with the altar?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-14/" title="1 Corinthians 9:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 Even so hath the Lord ordained that they which preach the gospel should live of the gospel.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-15/" title="1 Corinthians 9:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 But I have used none of these things: neither have I written these things, that it should be so done unto me: for *it were* better for me to die, than that any man should make my glorying void.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-16/" title="1 Corinthians 9:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 For though I preach the gospel, I have nothing to glory of: for necessity is laid upon me; yea, woe is unto me, if I preach not the gospel!

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-17/" title="1 Corinthians 9:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 For if I do this thing willingly, I have a reward: but if against my will, a dispensation *of the gospel* is committed unto me.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-18/" title="1 Corinthians 9:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 What is my reward then? *Verily* that, when I preach the gospel, I may make the gospel of Christ without charge, that I abuse not my power in the gospel.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-19/" title="1 Corinthians 9:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 For though I be free from all *men*, yet have I made myself servant unto all, that I might gain the more.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-20/" title="1 Corinthians 9:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And unto the Jews I became as a Jew, that I might gain the Jews; to them that are under the law, as under the law, that I might gain them that are under the law;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-21/" title="1 Corinthians 9:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 To them that are without law, as without law, (being not without law to God, but under the law to Christ,) that I might gain them that are without law.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-22/" title="1 Corinthians 9:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 To the weak became I as weak, that I might gain the weak: I am made all things to all *men*, that I might by all means save some.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-23/" title="1 Corinthians 9:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And this I do for the gospel's sake, that I might be partaker thereof with *you*.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-24/" title="1 Corinthians 9:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 Know ye not that they which run in a race run all, but one receiveth the prize? So run, that ye may obtain.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-25/" title="1 Corinthians 9:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they *do it* to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-26/" title="1 Corinthians 9:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 I therefore so run, not as uncertainly; so fight I, not as one that beateth the air:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-9-27/" title="1 Corinthians 9:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 But I keep under my body, and bring *it* into subjection: lest that by any means, when I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.
